title: Validate "EDIT" SSL Decrypt policy shows "Access method" correctly and can be added and save policy works
custom_steps:
- Login to tenant and go to Policies -> SSL Decryption policy
- click on "New Policy"
- In Match Criteria -> click on Add Criteria and add users or app or Access method
- add policy name, save policy and apply change
- Click on above policy to edit and add Access method in add creteria and review all 5 values listed correctly and select few values
- save policy and apply change
custom_expected:
- Ensure EDIT Flow shows Access method picker and checkbox for all access method values are selectable
- there should be no issues with save policy
- Policy table should show policy configuration correctly
